activities: Aspect Software, Inc. may transmit personal information from the EU/EEA or Switzerland between its facilities in order to provide certain services to customers.  In general, Aspect’s customers control the collection, retention, and use of personal information and determine the purposes and means of processing personal information on Aspect’s services.  Aspect processes personal information on behalf of and in accordance with its customers’ instructions or to provide managed or support services to customers using Aspect products and services.
corpofftitle1: Senior Vice President, Chief Information Officer
